Title: The Couch Trip
Writer: Ken Kolb (novel), Steven Kampmann (screenplay), William Porter (screenplay), Sean Stein (screenplay), Walter Bernstein (screenwriter)
Actors: Dan Aykroyd, Walter Matthau, Charles Grodin, Donna Dixon
Plot: The escaped delinquent John W. Burns, Jr. replaces Dr. Maitlin on a radio show, saying he's the psychiatrist Lawrence Baird. His tactless radio show is a hit, and he becomes very popular. ...
